name: Clockwork
description: php dev tools integrated to your browser

scripts.build-chrome: vue-cli-service build && del-cli dist/chrome && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/chrome && cp-cli platforms/chrome/ dist/chrome/
scripts.build-chrome-dev: vue-cli-service build --mode=development && del-cli dist/chrome && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/chrome && cp-cli platforms/chrome/ dist/chrome/
scripts.build-firefox: vue-cli-service build && del-cli dist/firefox && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/firefox && cp-cli platforms/firefox/ dist/firefox/
scripts.build-firefox-dev: vue-cli-service build --mode=development && del-cli dist/firefox && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/firefox && cp-cli platforms/firefox/ dist/firefox/
scripts.build-web: vue-cli-service build && del-cli dist/web && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/web
scripts.build-web-dev: vue-cli-service build --mode=development && del-cli dist/web && move-cli --mkdirp build dist/web
